text:
Dollar Shave Club | Software Engineers | Full-Time | ONSITE | Marina del Rey (Los Angeles), CA | https://www.dollarshaveclub.com

We're looking for frontend, backend, and infrastructure engineers! Come work with React, Go, Elixir, Kubernetes, and more! Here are a list of all our open engineering positions: https://jobs.jobvite.com/dollarshaveclub/jobs/team?c=Enginee...

  - Senior Software Engineer, Backend: https://jobs.jobvite.com/dollarshaveclub/job/oDc67fwM  
  - Senior Data Engineer: https://jobs.jobvite.com/dollarshaveclub/job/o9w76fwC
